Transport for London has confirmed the fares that will be imposed when the Elizabeth line opens to passengers next Tuesday morning.
These will match Tube prices other than at Heathrow, but fare capp… [+6459 chars]

articles.title: Ed Sheeran announces birth of second child - BBC
articles.description: Singer Ed Sheeran says he and wife Cherry Seaborn are "so in love" with their new baby.
articles.content:
